alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 2:31PM CDT until March 30 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 230 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Merrisach Lake to 6 miles north of Mcmillan Corner to near Millikin, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Scott around 245 PM CDT. Benoit around 250 PM CDT. Greenville, Leland, Metcalfe and Gunnison around 305 PM CDT. Shelby around 310 PM CDT. Deeson around 315 PM CDT. Shaw around 320 PM CDT. Cleveland, Renova and Boyle around 330 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Alligator, Winstonville, Beulah, Duncan, Pace and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
